channel.title: Florida on Sparkfire
channel.description: Recent content in Florida on Sparkfire

item.title: Fishing Florida
item.description: With just weeks left in Florida, I’ve been trying to take advantage of Florida’s more unique opportunities before we head west. I fished a lot when I was younger, but without mentors or the internet I never had much luck. After a decade hiatus it piqued my interest again and this time around I’ve been having much better success. Largemouth Bass If I have a favorite fish, it’s probably the largemouth bass.
